projects.name: Time Slicer
projects.desc: Time Slicer is a game I am currently working on together with WalkanFL. It was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, but has been evolving since and updates are coming soon.

projects.name: SimpleHTML
projects.desc: A small web project written in JS. It's goal was to create a simple HTML editor with live preview, ideal for begginners. It includes: Live preview, Theme customization (code) and Syntax Highlighting

projects.name: The Starving Monk
projects.desc: My first GameJam submission, ever. Made for LD 43.

projects.name: KARD
projects.desc: A submission to LD 44, made together with Snajper1212 and Samgus. A terrible platformer, mostly because of the lack of time.

projects.name: Keep Them Alive
projects.desc: A submission to LD 46, made with REafiki and Dragster. Horribly glitched, but somewhat fun.

projects.name: CMDImg
projects.desc: Useless tool to display images in console. Can convert images to ASCII, too.

projects.name: CC0Importer
projects.desc: A Unity plugin for directly downloading and importing assets from the popular cc0textures.com website.

projects.name: Loop The Loop
projects.desc: Fly to the beat! Try to avoid rockets and get as far as you can in this rythm-based pixel art game! Made for LD47
